Summary._: Southbound [R] via [F] from Roosevelt Av to Lexington Av-63 St then via [Q] line to 57 St-7 Av because of signal problems at Queens Plaza.

LongDescription:
Southbound [R] trains are stopping along the [F] line from Jackson Hts-Roosevelt Av to Lexington Av-63 St then operate on the [Q] line to 57 St-7 Av because of signal problems at Queens Plaza.
Expect delays in [E], [F], [N], [Q], [R] and [W] trains.
